name: Perspective - Startup Cities Game Jam
description:
Complete this exciting story game following one mans journey to end hatred and racism.  The only way to truly make everyone win is to forgive.

Assets Used:

Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack(karboosx)

LowPoly Environment Pack(k0rveen)

Horror Ambient Album - 060319(GWriterStudio)

RPG Monster Duo PBR Polyart(Dungeon Mason)
